Class StaffBoundary

java.lang.Object
Boundary
StaffBoundary
All Implemented Interfaces:
Base, BaseBoundary
public class StaffBoundary extends Boundary implements BaseBoundary
A Staff Boundary Object

A StaffBoundary object used process all Staff input and output
